org.naregi.rns.client
Interface RNSSearchClient

All Known Implementing Classes:
RNSSearchClientImpl
public interface RNSSearchClient

RNSSearchClient object is generated by RNSClientHome.getRNSSearchClient(). RNSSearchClient implementation is RNSSearchClientImpl.

Method Summary
 RNSDirHandle listBySearch(java.lang.String dirPath)
          List directory entries by Search operation.
 RNSSearchResult search(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String xquery)
          Search Metadata (<RNSEntryResponseType> structure) of the entry.

          Bulk search operation.
 RNSSearchResultHandle searchRecursive(java.lang.String dirPath, java.lang.String xquery, int depth)
          Search recursively.
 

Method Detail

search

RNSSearchResult search(java.lang.String path,
                       java.lang.String xquery)
                       throws RNSError
Search Metadata (<RNSEntryResponseType> structure) of the entry. The return structure also should be <RNSEntryResponseType>. The pure <RNSEntryResponseType> structure is searched by "/" as the XQuery (XPath). 
 --- Example of the XQuery format ---
 declare namespace ns1 = "http://schemas.ogf.org/rns/2009/12/rns";
 let $ent := /ns1:RNSEntryResponseType
 let $name := string($ent/@entry-name)
 let $epr := $ent/ns1:endpoint
 let $meta := $ent/ns1:metadata
 let $sptrns := $meta/ns1:supports-rns

 let $retv :=
 (
   for $m in $meta/*
   let $metatag := local-name($m)
   let $key := string($m/@key)
   let $value := $m/text()
   where $key = "key1"
     and fn:matches($value, "^[0-9]+$")
     and xs:integer($value) >= 1000
   return
   $m
 )
 where exists($retv)
 return
 <ns1:RNSEntryResponseType entry-name="{$name}"
   xmlns:ns1="http://schemas.ogf.org/rns/2009/12/rns"
   xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
   xsi:type="ns1:RNSEntryResponseType">
   {$epr}"
   <ns1:metadata xsi:type="ns1:RNSMetadataType">
     {$sptrns}
     {$retv}
   </ns1:metadata>
 </ns1:RNSEntryResponseType>

Parameters:
path - a pathname
xquery - XQuery of the request
Returns:
null if the result does not exist
Throws:
RNSError - if an error occurs

searchBulk

RNSSearchResultHandle searchBulk(java.lang.String dirPath,
                                 java.lang.String[] names,
                                 java.lang.String xquery)
                                 throws RNSError
Bulk search operation. See search(String, String)

Parameters:
dirPath - a parent directory
names - names of the children
xquery - XQuery of the request
Returns:
null if the result does not exist
Throws:
RNSError - if an error occurs

searchRecursive

RNSSearchResultHandle searchRecursive(java.lang.String dirPath,
                                      java.lang.String xquery,
                                      int depth)
                                      throws RNSError
Search recursively. See search(String, String)

Parameters:
dirPath - a directory pathname. (This directory is not searched)
xquery - XQuery of the request
depth - a number of depth to search recursively
Returns:
null or empty result in RNSSearchResultHandle if the result does not exist
Throws:
RNSError - if an error occurs

listBySearch

RNSDirHandle listBySearch(java.lang.String dirPath)
                          throws RNSError
List directory entries by Search operation. This is the same result as RNSClient#list(dirPath, false). See RNSClient.list(String, boolean).

Parameters:
dirPath - a directory pathname
Returns:
RNSDirHandle. (have no entry if this is null)
Throws:
RNSError - if an error occurs
